subject: The statue
sentence: The statue resembles a famous historical figure.
paragraph: Many statues were crafted by the artisans in the ancient kingdom. Their skills were renowned and admired across the land. The statue resembles a famous historical figure. This craftsmanship was revered by all. Tourists flocked to see it every year.

subject: The garden

subject: The field

subject: The cloud
paragraph: On a bright day, the sky was filled with fluffy shapes. Some clouds were large, while others appeared tiny. The cloud resembles a dragon. Imaginative onlookers pointed and laughed. It slowly drifted across the horizon.
